profile.name: @anhkhoadev
profile.title: Fullstack Developer (5 years)
profile.valueProposition: Developing full-cycle digital products that pair high-concurrency backend systems with optimized user journeys to fuel enterprise growth.

summary: Deep expertise in ASP.NET Core & Distributed Systems.
Proven track record in optimizing database performance.
Passionate about Clean Architecture & Domain-Driven Design.
Advanced proficiency in Angular, RxJS, and sophisticated State Management (NgRx/Signals).
Expertise in crafting high-performance, modular architectures with Standalone Components & Micro-frontends.

projects.name: Social Network Project for Pet

projects.name: Financial Project
projects.problem: Development The financial project allows investors to pool capital and invest in cryptocurrencies. This project is built on the .Net 6 platform and Angular 16.The project requires processing and calculating the approach to handling big data with over 50,000 members.
impact: Optimized SQL queries to reduce report generation time to < 10 minutes.
Implemented automated background processing for heavy calculations.
Ensured 100% data accuracy across millions of transaction records.

projects.name: SAP Extension (Desktop version)
projects.problem: Develop features related to the desktop version of SAP, including: modifying existing SAP forms, creating additional UDOs, and developing a win-mobile application for barcode scanning.
impact: Develop custom UIs based on design specifications, integrated as SAP extensions for the SAP Desktop interface.
Optimize MS SQL queries for SAP Business One to be integrated into Crystal Reports.
Fine-tune T-SQL queries to improve data access speed and efficiency for SAP consulting teams.

projects.name: ERP Project
projects.problem: Develop enterprise web applications integrated with the existing SAP HANA platform; build data-driven AI applications and leverage AI technologies to optimize company workflows.
projects.role: Full Stack Developer (.NET + Angular + Flutter + Tauri (Rust))
impact: Developed backend applications to orchestrate and manage asynchronous background tasks and recurring scheduled jobs.
Architected AI-powered applications for dynamic data retrieval, implementing strict Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to ensure data security.
Optimized LLM operational costs by implementing efficient prompting strategies and selecting model architectures tailored to specific business requirements.

description: Mentoring junior developers and establishing code quality standards.
